FuncDef:
The ipv4 east-west command configures the destination IP address and MTU for east-west traffic in an open system.
The undo ipv4 east-west command deletes the destination IP address and MTU for east-west communication in an open system. The ipv4 east-west command configures the destination IP address and MTU for east-west traffic in an open system. The undo ipv4 east-west command deletes the destination IP address and MTU for east-west communication in an open system. By default, no east-west address is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the east-west address of an open system.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the MTU value for east-west communication.
The value is an integer ranging from 1500 to 9600.
